DOC.brief_summary: The purpose propose study determine effect consume high protein diet fecal microbial community , gastrointestinal function symptom , general wellness older adult .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects High Protein Diet Microbiota , Gastrointestinal Function Wellness Older Women
DOC.detailed_description: Older woman randomize 18-week crossover study design . During treatment period participant provide weight maintenance diet provide approximately 2 g/kg/day protein . Following two-week baseline random order follow diet assign : The participant provide weight maintenance , high protein diet two week , two-weeks resume normal diet ; The participant come back clinic next two week receive high protein diet multi-strain probiotic two week , two-weeks resume normal diet ; The participant come back clinic next two week receive high protein diet prebiotic , two-weeks resume normal diet ; The participant come back clinic next two week receive high protein diet synbiotic combination . two-weeks resume normal diet Participants researcher blind treatment period ( participant receive probiotic placebo capsule , prebiotic placebo sachet ) . The follow perform clinic visit : Questionnaires assess quality life ( QoL ) , wellness , gastrointestinal symptom , bowel movement frequency , compliance . Hand-grip strength measure . Blood urine sample collect baseline week 2 , 6,10 14 . Stool sample collect baseline week 2 , 4 , 6 , 8,10 , 12 , 14 16 .
DOC.criteria: To participate study must woman 65 year age old willing complete daily weekly questionnaire willing wear SenseWear Pro Armband ( BodyMedia , Inc. ) monitor energy expenditure establish dietary energy need willing provide blood sample , stool sample , urine sample throughout course study willing discontinue prebiotics , probiotic and/or fiber supplement duration study willing consume provide diet designated 8 week study willing report maintain usual alcohol intake throughout study able take food , study fiber , probiotic , placebo without aid another person able attend schedule study appointment duration study usual protein intake consistent United States ' population assess dietary analysis usual fiber intake consistent United States ' population assess dietary analysis willing provide social security number receive study payment . To participate study must NOT physiciandiagnosed gastrointestinal disease condition ( ulcerative colitis , Crohn 's disease , gastroparesis , peptic ulcer disease , cancer , celiac disease , short bowel disease , ileostomy ) currently treat know illness condition may impact perceived health HIV/AIDS , immune modulating disease ( autoimmune , hepatitis , cancer , etc . ) , diabetes chronic kidney disease vegetarian know food allergy dietary restriction currently take medication constipation diarrhea take antibiotic within past 2 month current smoker planning loosing/gaining weight next 6 month typically consume one alcoholic beverage per day BMI great 30
